text: one of my fondest childhood memories is
a root beer float well this one today is
an affogato float it's a good adult
version of a classic childhood favorite
two scoops of coffee ice cream
into a cup you could use vanilla ice
cream but I like a really robust coffee
flavor so I'm using coffee ice cream and
I'm gonna top that with a shot of
espresso I love this Bialetti stovetop
espresso makes them nice concentrated
brew that goes right over you could also
use vanilla ice cream if you want a
gentler coffee flavor a shot of cold
milk use whole milk here might as well
live a little right and top that off
with seltzer water also cold and just
like that you have a delicious adult
affogato float
spoon repeat until it's all gone
you
